contest-event.event-date: Sept. 24, 1921 D National Championship of Great Britain (Crystal Palace) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Life Divine Crystal Palace (Concert Hall), Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK George Mercer was the reserve adjudicator. Prizes: 1st: 100 Pounds plus the 1000 Guinea Trophy 2nd: 50 Pounds plus the Daily Telegraph Challenge Cup 3rd: 30 Pounds 4th: 20 Pounds 5th: 10 Pounds 18 bands competed May 13, 2010, 11:03 a.m. March 16, 2018, 6:32 p.m. 1 St. Hilda Colliery William Halliwell 2 Fodens Band William Halliwell 3 Wingates Band William Halliwell 4 Black Dyke Band J.
